settings.title: Road Approved
settings.content: Max speed is capped at 25 km/h when sold in Australia in compliance with local laws and regulations. Please contact us for the steps involved to unlock the speed after purchase.

settings.title: Description
settings.content:
The Smart Choice for Modern Commuters
Looking for something more? The Pluto Electric Scooter builds on the strengths of our popular Astro model, offering you a step up in speed, range, and comfort. Designed for commuters who seek performance and reliability, the Pluto delivers on every ride, making it the perfect blend of practicality and power for daily adventures.

*Range Testing: In flat surface testing (Full Battery, 13 km/h), the Aurora and Kaiju achieved 100 km, the Pluto delivered 50km and the Astro reached 45 km, all under standard mode with a 70 kg load.

On varied Australian terrain (Full Battery), using a mix of pedestrian and regular modes, the Aurora and Kaiju delivered 70–80 km, the Pluto delivered 40km while the Astro achieved 30–35 km.

settings.title: Key Features
settings.content:
Lithium Battery Pack: Powered by a high-quality lithium battery, the Pluto offers an impressive 50 km range on a full charge, ensuring you get where you need to go.

Powerful Motor: Equipped with a 850W motor, the Pluto delivers smooth and reliable power for a comfortable ride at speeds up to 35 km/h.

Portable and Removable Battery: Enjoy the convenience of a removable battery, allowing you to charge it easily at any available power point.

Dual Spring Suspension: Experience a smoother ride with the dual spring suspension system on the front, absorbing bumps and ensuring maximum comfort on uneven roads.

Cruise Control (Unlockable): Experience effortless riding with the Pluto's cruise control feature. Enjoy longer rides with less strain while maintaining a consistent speed.

Lightweight and Portable: Weighing just 19kg, the Pluto is easy to carry and transport, making it perfect for your daily commute or weekend trips.

To adjust the default settings of your scooter, such as cruise control, you can learn more here.

settings.title: Returns
settings.content: For information on our return policy, including eligibility and instructions, please visit our Returns & Refunds Policy.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.content:
Free Shipping on All Orders
At The Simple Commute, we believe in keeping things simple. That’s why we now offer free shipping on all orders, no matter the total.

No hidden costs or fees—just straightforward service to get you moving.

Free Click & Collect + E-Scooter Setup (Victoria Only)
Victorian customers can enjoy our free Click & Collect service, which includes complimentary e-scooter setup. Pick up your order and hit the road right away with your fully assembled e-scooter!

Fast Dispatch
We aim for speedy dispatch on all orders. Orders placed by 12 PM AEST are typically dispatched the same day, with 98% of orders leaving our Boronia, Victoria warehouse either same-day or next day. Orders placed on weekends or public holidays will ship on the next business day.

Quick Delivery
We deliver across Australia, with typical delivery times of 1 to 5 business days. However, please note that delivery times may vary based on your location.

Important Lithium Battery Shipping Info
Due to lithium battery regulations, air freight is not available, which may slightly extend delivery times. We appreciate your patience as we ensure the safe delivery of your e-scooter.

For any questions or assistance, feel free to contact our support team. We're here to help!

settings.title: Warranty
settings.content: All of our scooters come with limited warranty. For details, see our warranty page

settings.title: Certification
settings.content:
Our E-Scooters (including batteries) are tested to meet the following standards:

  • UL2272
  • EN17128
  • IEC 62133-2
  • IEC 60335-1
  • EN IEC 55014-1
  • EN IEC 55014-1
  • CE EMC
  • ROHS

settings.title: How can I service the scooter?
settings.content: You can service your e-scooter by bringing it to The Simple Commute's repair center (8/1001 Mountain Highway, Boronia, Melbourne), or you can ship it to us. Once the repair is complete, you have two weeks to pick up your scooter or pay the return shipping invoice. After this period, a storage fee of $25 per day applies, up to a maximum of 30 days. Proper packaging is crucial if you need to ship your scooter to the repair center. You can obtain third-party packaging or purchase a box from us (subject to availability). Repair turnaround times vary based on the availability of spare parts, ranging from 3-5 days to a minimum of 30 days. For updates, you can reach out to The Simple Commute team.

settings.title: What is the speed of the scooter?
settings.content: The speed of the Pluto E-scooter is capable of reaching up to 35 km/h. However, we have to limit it to 25 km/h to comply with local regulations. If you'd like to unlock the full speed, you can contact us, but please be aware that you will be fully liable for any consequences that may arise from doing so.

settings.title: What is the range of the scooter?
settings.content: The Pluto E-scooter offers a maximum range of up to 50 km on a full charge, making it the ideal choice for daily commutes and city rides.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available  24/7 All Day, Every Day.
